parameters: I'm just going to ask once, but it will be nice. Can I please have the
weave you just stole so I can return it?

Look, you can't live life being this sensitive. People will eat you a live
if you let them know they're getting to you. Don't give away your power like
that. So don't take what everyone else says about you so personally, cunt.
